      • getContentType

        public String getContentType()

      • setContentType

        public void setContentType(String val)
        Description copied from interface: HttpConfig.Request

        The contentType property is used to specify the Content-Type header value for the request.

        def http = HttpBuilder.configure {
     request.uri = 'http://localhost:10101'
     request.contentType = 'text/json'
}

http.post {
     request.uri.path = '/bar'
     request.contentType = 'text/csv'
}

        By default, the value will be text/plain. The ContentTypes class provides a helper for some of the more common content type values.

        Parameters:
        val - the content type value to be used

      • getCharset

        public Charset getCharset()

      • setCharset

        public void setCharset(Charset val)
        Description copied from interface: HttpConfig.Request

        The charset property is used to specify the character set (as a Charset) used by the request. This value will be reflected in the Content-Type header value (e.g. Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8). A content-type value must be specified in order for this value to be applied.

        def http = HttpBuilder.configure {
     request.uri = 'http://localhost:10101'
     request.charset = 'utf-16'
}

http.post {
     request.uri.path = '/bar'
     request.charset = 'utf-8'
}
        Parameters:
        val - the content type character set value to be used

      • getUri

        public UriBuilder getUri()
        Description copied from interface: HttpConfig.Request

        Retrieves the UriBuilder for the request, which provides methods for more fine-grained URI specification.

        def http = HttpBuilder.configure {
     request.uri = 'http://localhost:10101'
}

http.get {
     request.uri.path = '/foo'
}
        Returns:
        the UriBuilder for the request

      • getHeaders

        public Map<String,String> getHeaders()
        Description copied from interface: HttpConfig.Request

        Used to retrieve the request headers.

        Returns:
        the Map of request headers

      • getBody

        public Object getBody()

      • setBody

        public void setBody(Object val)
        Description copied from interface: HttpConfig.Request

        The body property is used to configure the body content for the request. The request body content may be altered by configured encoders internally or may be passed on unmodified. See HttpConfig and HttpObjectConfig for content-altering methods (encoders, decoders and interceptors).

        Parameters:
        val - the request body content

      • getAuth

        public HttpConfigs.ThreadSafeAuth getAuth()
        Description copied from interface: HttpConfig.Request

        Retrieves the authentication information for the request.

        Returns:
        the authentication information for the request.
